content.raw: It would be better to not set `CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX` at all.  It's supposed to be set by the user.  Most developers will set it to a sandbox location in their home directories and the debbuilder will explicitly set it to `/usr`.  When it's not set, it'll follow default platform-specific CMake behavior, which is to install into `/usr/local`.
